general_advisory: Rice: Drain out excess water from paddy field & regular surveillance work should be taken up in all crops. Sugarcane: Collect setts, do sett rot management, remove infected plants, spray after harvesting. Blackgram: Spray to reduce incidence of powdery mildew, anthracnose & stem rot. Rapeseed & Mustard: Spray for controlling pests. Vegetables: Various spraying recommendations for different pests. Pisciculture: Treat white spot disease in fish. Animal science: Provide mineral mixture along with salt regularly.

advisory: Drain out excess water from paddy field & regular surveillance work should be taken up in all crops to control disease pests.
Collect setts from disease-free plants for planting.
Manage sett rot disease with recommended sprays.
Remove infected plants in ratoon crop and apply recommended treatments.
Protect harvested sugarcane from termite attack.
Spray to reduce incidence of powdery mildew, anthracnose & stem rot.
Spraying recommendations for Red Pumpkin Beetle, Epilachna Beetle, and other pests in different vegetables.
Provide support for tomato plants to improve fruit set.
Spray to control sucking insect pests in nursery and main field.
Treat white spot disease in fish by bathing affected fish in saltwater.
Provide mineral mixture with salt regularly.
Include wheat grains, jaggery, etc., in the daily ration during winter season for energy requirement.
